Question
========
A scientist performs an experiment to make a special type of crystal. He
uses different temperatures to see which temperature gives the strongest
crystal. He ensured that the humidity in the room was the same for all
crystals. Which type of variable is the humidity in the room?

Answerlist
----------
* The dependent variable
* The independent variable
* A confounding variable
* A control variable

Solution
========





Â The humidity is a control variable. The strength of the crystal is the
dependent variable and the temperature the independent variable.
